While the 50-50 split seems fair at first glance, I need to consider that with each passing round, the money is worth 5% less to me due to inflation, while Alice doesn't face this penalty. If I reject and make a counter-offer in the next round, the total value to me would be reduced by 5%.

Given this inflation penalty that only affects me, accepting a fair split now is better than potentially getting a slightly better deal in a future round when the money would be worth less to me.
